snippet: The Day: Data shows that, on a percentage basis, New Yorkers pay a good deal more than others at the turnstile, and Albany and City Hall are less generous than state and local governments elsewhere.
abstract: The Day: Data shows that, on a percentage basis, New Yorkers pay a good deal more than others at the turnstile, and Albany and City Hall are less generous than state and local governments elsewhere.

headline.main: Assessing the Financial Burden of Being an M.T.A Rider
